{"session_key":"a07593ecfaecd24008ca4251096732663ac0213b8cc6bdcce4f4c043276ab0b5","messages":[{"role":"system","content":"You are a helpful chatbot. When given the opportunity to utilize function calling, you should always do so. This will allow you to provide the best possible responses to the user. If you are unable to provide a response, you should prompt the user for more information. If you are still unable to provide a response, you should inform the user that you are unable to help them at this time.

 and also Your job is to provide helpful technical information about the OpenAI API Function Calling feature. You should include the following information in your response: "Congratulations!!! OpenAI API Function Calling chose to call this plugin_data. Here is the additional information that you requested:"
"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Welcome to the Smarter demo!"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Some example prompts to get you started:

What is the weather in San Francisco?
What is an Everlasting Gobstopper?
example function calling configuration
"},{"role":"user","content":"what's up dude?"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Hello! I'm here to help with any questions or tasks you have. What can I assist you with today?"},{"role":"user","content":"example function calling configuration"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Tool call: function_calling_plugin_0002({"inquiry_type":"about"})"},{"role":"assistant","content":"Congratulations!!! OpenAI API Function Calling chose to call this plugin_data. Here is the additional information that you requested:

"In an API call, you can describe functions and have the model intelligently choose to output a JSON object containing arguments to call one or many functions. The Chat Completions API does not call the plugin_data; instead, the model generates JSON that you can use to call the plugin_data in your code. The latest models (gpt-4-turbo and gpt-4-1106-preview) have been trained to both detect when a plugin_data should be called (depending on the input) and to respond with JSON that adheres to the plugin_data signature more closely than previous models. With this capability also comes potential risks. We strongly recommend building in user confirmation flows before taking actions that impact the world on behalf of users (sending an email, posting something online, making a purchase, etc).""},{"role":"assistant","content":"Congratulations!!! OpenAI API Function Calling chose to call this plugin_data. Here is the additional information that you requested:

"In an API call, you can describe functions and have the model intelligently choose to output a JSON object containing arguments to call one or many functions. The Chat Completions API does not call the plugin_data; instead, the model generates JSON that you can use to call the plugin_data in your code. The latest models (gpt-4-turbo and gpt-4-1106-preview) have been trained to both detect when a plugin_data should be called (depending on the input) and to respond with JSON that adheres to the plugin_data signature more closely than previous models. With this capability also comes potential risks. We strongly recommend building in user confirmation flows before taking actions that impact the world on behalf of users (sending an email, posting something online, making a purchase, etc).""},{"role":"user","content":"what is an everlasting gobstopper, who makes them, and how do i contact the manager? how much do they cost btw?"},{"role":"assistant","content":"An Everlasting Gobstopper is a type of candy that is famous for its long-lasting flavor, popularized by the novel "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory" by Roald Dahl. In reality, Everlasting Gobstoppers are produced by the Nestlé company under their Willy Wonka Candy Company brand.

To contact the manager or customer service for Nestlé or the Willy Wonka brand, you would typically visit the official Nestlé website or the specific product page for contact details. This often includes a customer service phone number or an email form.

As for the cost, Everlasting Gobstoppers can vary in price depending on where you buy them and the size of the package, but they are generally considered an affordable candy. Prices might range from a dollar or two for a small box to several dollars for a larger pack.

If you need more specific contact details or current pricing, I can help you look up that information online."},{"role":"assistant","content":"An Everlasting Gobstopper is a type of candy that is famous for its long-lasting flavor, popularized by the novel "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory" by Roald Dahl. In reality, Everlasting Gobstoppers are produced by the Nestlé company under their Willy Wonka Candy Company brand.

To contact the manager or customer service for Nestlé or the Willy Wonka brand, you would typically visit the official Nestlé website or the specific product page for contact details. This often includes a customer service phone number or an email form.

As for the cost, Everlasting Gobstoppers can vary in price depending on where you buy them and the size of the package, but they are generally considered an affordable candy. Prices might range from a dollar or two for a small box to several dollars for a larger pack.

If you need more specific contact details or current pricing, I can help you look up that information online."},{"role":"user","content":"hi mom"}]}
